instruction-for-use.navodila-za-uporabo: Univerzalna krema, uporablja se za obraz in telo.

product-info.opis: Univerzalna krema, namenjena otrokom in odraslim. Krema se hitro vpije, priporoča se jo za mazanje občutljive in suhe kože. Koža jo dobro prenaša.

ingredient-information.sestavine: Aqua, Petrolatum, Paraffinum Liquidum, Ozokerite, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Glycerin, Glyceryl Isostearate, Sorbitan Oleate, Polyglyceryl-3 Oleate, Cera Alba, Stearic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Magnesium Sulfate, Parfum, Ethylhexylglycerin, 2-Bromo-2-nitropropane-1,3-diol, Alpha-isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Alcohol, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Cinnamyl Alcohol, Citronellol, Coumarin, Geraniol, Limonene, Linalool.
